synopsis.text:
On an unassuming island, Wu Liuqi, a forgetful assassin with a knack for shape-shifting, runs a humble hair salon alongside his feathered companion, Dai Bo. Despite his intimidating appearance and unique abilities, including telekinetic scissor techniques, Wu's performance in his side job as a contract killer is less than stellar. Often mistakenly targeting the wrong individuals or bungling his missions, Wu's heart doesn't quite align with his line of work.

However, these odd jobs serve a greater purpose: to repay his debts and, hopefully, unlock the secrets of his forgotten past. As Wu navigates through his dual life as a hairdresser and assassin, his adventures seem to weave a tapestry that leads him closer to his lost memories. Despite his struggles, Wu's journey is a testament to his resilience and his unyielding quest to rediscover his true identity.
